localizedText.descDeletionInterval: Lower frequencies cause larger deletions, while higher frequencies ensure smoother charts.
localizedText.descCompressAfter: The interval of TimescaleDB's add_compression_policy determines the point in time from which data is compressed.
localizedText.descCompression: Compression on large tables can take a significant amount of time. Compression affects storage efficiency and query performance.
localizedText.descConnectionString: ODBC connection string to the PostgreSQL database
localizedText.descDatabaseSize: The size of the hypertable used by this configuration.
localizedText.descGetTrendLineData: Retrieves an array of timestamps and data points for the requested symbol(s).
localizedText.descAnalyticsType: Specifies which analytics calculations to perform on the retrieved data.
localizedText.descDeleteDatabaseEntries: Delete records from the historized database.
localizedText.descGetTrendLineWindow: Retrieves the time window for a specific TrendLineChart.
localizedText.descDiagnostics: Retrieves information about the historized data that is stored in the database.
localizedText.descDeleteDatabaseEntriesValues: Disable recording and delete database entries of 'MySymbol'. If 'symbolName' is not set, all entries in the database will be deleted. 'disableRecording' disables the recording of one or all historize symbols depending if 'symbolName' is set.
localizedText.msgGroupEmptyReadValue: One or more symbols contain no data [Execution result: {0}, Result: {1}, Extension result: {2}]. Symbol(s): {3}
